attributes.action: Provide the right support for individuals with mental health
attributes.additional_details: For years and years there have been (mental) institutes , now know as ‘hospitals’ for individuals with learning disabilities, challenging behaviour and mental illnesses. It’s not been too long since a lot of these places had been forced to close because of human rights. Because these individuals have the same rights as all of us!
attributes.background: I have witnessed individuals make incredible changes in their lives because of the support network around them has been the right support for them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you're concerned about mental health services, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to ensure people have the mental health support they need.
